item.title: Vintage Kids' Books My Kid Loves
item.description:
“Seeking children's books of old from library/yard sales, used book stores, ebay, etc.”
By Burgin Streetman.

item.title: Mr Ripleys Enchanted Books
item.description:
“A blog about books and reading, the enjoyment of a good story. A place you can find children's and young adult literature reviews, news and giveaways.”
🇬🇧 Started in 2008.
Average 84 words.
